Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Waller
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via: Chicago, Central, Augusta, and Austin due to, street blockage near Chicago/Waller.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted  in both directions via: Chicago, Central, Augusta, and Austin due to, street blockage near Chicago/Waller.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/57th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 59th, Ashland and 55th: due to, street blockage near Racine/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Loyola.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
